name: Transmission (itch) (TheUnknown1050)
description:
Made by me and my friend Mythic!

A fun sandbox game with no end - Portals and Grappling guns, do what you want! More updates will come soon with stuff like picking up objects and stuff. Also this is a prototype not a fully released game.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
Left click - Use grappling gun

Thanks for playing!
